item.title: ItemOnNpc help!
item.dc:creator: @tomzyy11 tomzyy11
item.description:
@tomzyy11 wrote:

Base: Palidino 76 508

Ok so I’m trying to to make it so that when I use a armadyl statuette on this tramp he will give me 750k and remove the Armadyl statuette but it dosen’t work when I use the stat on the tramp it just says some things in the chat box and I do not receive the gp nor does the stat get taken, here is my code:

if (itemId == 13197 && npcSlot == 11) { if(player.hasReq(player, 13197, 1)) { Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(player, 13197, 1, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 995, 750000); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You sell your Armadyl Statuette for 750k"); } }

Read full topic
